pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pipeline for GWAS Using MLMM // Pipeline for Genome-Wide Association Study using Multi-Locus Mixed Model from Segura V, Vilhjlmsson BJ et al. (2012) doi:10.1038/ng.2314. The pipeline include detection of associated SNPs with MLMM, model selection by lowest eBIC, estimation of the effects of the SNPs in the selected model and graphical functions.
